players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Bob is dead, which means one of us is the mafia. We need to be very careful with our votes and pay attention to who acts suspiciously."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafia. We should vote to arrest her now to protect the town."
You: "Bob's death is a tragic loss for the town. I'm still trying to process what happened and understand how we can move forward."
Diana: "Alice's silence after accusing her makes me suspicious. Charlie may be trying to frame Alice quickly. We should discuss more before voting to avoid a mistake."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafia. Delaying the vote only gives her more time to harm us. We must act now to keep the town safe."
